        program combined
        implicit none

        integer :: n, a, b, i, j, tmp, radix, N1, MODVAL
        integer, allocatable, dimension(:) :: list1, list2
        logical, allocatable, dimension(:) :: in_list1
        integer, allocatable :: mod_arr(:)
        integer, dimension(0:2018) :: mod_cnt
        integer(kind=8) :: ans, nci
        character(len=:), allocatable :: S1, S2, S3
        character(len=20) :: temp
        character(len=1) :: c
        MODVAL = 2019

        ! Read n, a, b
        read(*,*) n, a, b

        ! Allocate and read list1
        allocate(list1(a))
        do i=1, a
            read(*,*) list1(i)
        end do

        ! Allocate and read list2
        allocate(list2(b))
        do i=1, b
            read(*,*) list2(i)
        end do

        ! Create a boolean array for list1
        allocate(in_list1(n))
        in_list1 = .false.
        do i=1, a
            if (list1(i) >= 1 .and. list1(i) <= n) then
                in_list1(list1(i)) = .true.
            end if
        end do

        ! Build S1
        allocate(character(len=n) :: S1)
        do i=1, n
            if (in_list1(i)) then
                S1(i:i) = '1'
            else
                S1(i:i) = '2'
            end if
        end do

        ! Second program: 
        N1 = n   ! because S1 has length n
        if (allocated(mod_arr)) deallocate(mod_arr)
        allocate(mod_arr(N1))
        mod_arr = 0
        mod_cnt = 0
        radix = 1

        do i=1, N1
            j = N1 - i + 1   ! index in S1 (from the last)
            tmp = ichar(S1(j:j)) - ichar('0')   ! convert char to integer
            tmp = mod(tmp * radix, MODVAL)

            if (i > 1) then
                tmp = mod(tmp + mod_arr(i-1), MODVAL)
            end if

            mod_arr(i) = tmp
            mod_cnt(tmp) = mod_cnt(tmp) + 1

            radix = mod(radix * 10, MODVAL)
        end do

        mod_cnt(0) = mod_cnt(0) + 1

        ans = 0_8
        do i=0, MODVAL-1
            if (mod_cnt(i) < 2) cycle
            nci = int(mod_cnt(i), 8)
            ans = ans + nci * (nci - 1_8) / 2_8
        end do

        ! Convert ans to string S2
        write(temp, '(I0)') ans
        S2 = trim(temp)

        ! Third program: 
        S3 = ''
        do i=1, len(S2)
            c = S2(i:i)
            if (c == '0') then
                S3 = S3 // '0'
            else if (c == '1') then
                S3 = S3 // '1'
            else if (c == 'B') then
                if (len(S3) > 0) then
                    S3 = S3(1:len(S3)-1)
                end if
            end if
        end do

        write(*, '(A)') S3

        end program combined
